content: information, see 6.4.2, “CPACF protected key” on page 213. The CPACF feature provides hardware acceleration for the following cryptographic services:  Symmetric ciphers – DES – Triple-DES – AES-128 – AES-192 – AES-256 (all for clear and protected keys)  Elliptic curves cryptography (ECC) – ECDSA, ECDH, support for the NIST P256, NIST P386, NIST P521 – EdDSA for Ed25519, Ed448 Curves – ECDH for X25519, X448 Curves 212 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide – Key generation for NIST, Ed and X curves  Hashes/MACs – SHA-1 – SHA-224 (SHA-2 or SHA-3 standard) – SHA-256 (SHA-2 or SHA-3 standard) – SHA-384 (SHA-2 or SHA-3 standard) – SHA-512 (SHA-2 or SHA-3 standard) – SHAKE-128 – SHAKE-256 – GHASH  Random number generator – PRNG (3DES based) – DRNG (NIST SP-800-90A SHA-512 based) – TRNG (true random number generator It provides high-performance hardware encryption, decryption, hashing, and random number generation support. The following instructions support the cryptographic assist
